page.title: 19Day in The Life.
page.content:
I get up at quarter to eight and get dressed.For breakfast I have cereal.We leave for school at half past eight and get to school at ten to nine.
Usually we start with assembly and then do maths until playtime.We have play for fifteen minutes during which we play football.We then write a story until lunch,and have three quarters of an hour play.In the afternoon we do project work until we go home at three thirty,unless I am going to a club. There is a bird club,art and craft club,games club, drama club, gardening club,and computer club.
My sister and I go swimming after school. Then we go home,watch T.V., have tea,and go to bed.
